query: Q1. How can you open a file selected in Lightroom CC for retouching in Photoshop CC?
options:
Double-click the file
 Choose File > Edit in Photoshop
 Choose File > Save to Photoshop
 Press Cmd/Ctrl+E

query: Q2. How can you undo one or more changes just made to an image?
options:
Use the keyboard shortcut Cmd/Ctrl+Z
 Click a state in the history panel
 Choose File > Undo
 Press Cmd/Ctrl+U

query: Q3. How can you select a specific layer? (find all that apply)
options:
Click the eye icon in the layers panel
 Use the Move tool with auto-select enabled
 Right-click the image and select layer
 Press Cmd/Ctrl and click the layer

query: Q5. How do you crop a document without permanently discarding pixels along the edge?
options:
Clear the Delete Cropped Pixels box.
 Select the Delete Cropped Pixels box.
 Use the Smart Crop tool.
 Hold the Alt (Windows) or Option (Mac) key.

query: Q6. What feature should you use to simulate the in-camera development recipes applied by manufacturers with your own raw files?
options:
presets
 Camera Matching profiles
 calibration
 snapshots

query: Q7. When working in an RGB document, which option is **NOT** a method for the Select Color Range command?
options:
Sampled Colors
 Skin Tones
 Key (Blacks)
 Out of Gamut

query: Q8. How do you access the Auto Color Correction Options dialog box?
options:
Select Image > Auto Tone.
 Select Image > Auto Color.
 Alt-click (Option-click) the Auto button in the Properties panel when you have a Levels or Curves adjustment layer targeted in the Layers panel.
 Hold down the Alt (Option) key and select Image > Auto Color.

query: Q9. Which options are available when using the Free Transform command on a Smart Object?
options:
C,D
 D,E
 B,C
 C,E

query: Q10. What is considered the minimum DPI for photographic-quality inkjet printing?
Q11. Which scanner type is capable of producing the highest resolution scans?
options:
flatbed scanner
 slide scanner
 all-in-one unit
 drum scanner

query: Q12. Which format does NOT support an alpha channel?
options:
PSD
 PNG
 TIFF
 BMP

query: Q13. What is the best way to save multiple images into a single PDF?
options:
Save each PDF separately first and then combine them.
 Check to see if you have Acrobat Professional installed.
 Use the PDF Presentation command.
 Click File > Export > Export Layers to Files.

query: Q14. What option cannot be adjusted with the Print command directly in the Print window?
options:
size of the image
 position on the page
 paper quality
 color management policies

query: Q15. Which statement best describes the Quick Mask feature?
options:
It allows you to use the Pen tool to edit a selection
 It allows you to use the Brush tool to create or refine a selection
 It allows you to duplicate a mask quickly.
 It allows you to convert a vector mask to a layer mask.

query: Q19. What can you use to save a common crop size?
options:
tool sets
 preferences
 modifier keys
 tool presets

query: Q21. To reduce the file size of a PDF, what should you do?
options:
Upsample large images
 Convert 8-bit images to 16-bit
 Apply compression to the document
 all of these answers

query: Q22. Which image adjustment is **not** available as an adjustment layer?
options:
Levels
 Shadows/Highlights
 Curves
 Hue/Saturation

query: Q23. With default Essentials settings, where would you find the Red Eye tool?
options:
grouped with the Eyedropper tool
 Image > Mode > Red Eye
 Edit > Red Eye
 grouped with the Spot Healing Brush tool

query: Q26. Which option would you use to clone while respecting perspective planes?
options:
Patch
 Vanishing Point
 Clone Stamp
 Healing Brush

query: Q27. In order to run a filter on an entire video file, what must you do first?
options:
Convert the video file to an image sequence.
 Convert the video file to a Smart Object.
 Actually, you cannot use filters on video files.
 Convert the video file to an animated gif.

query: Q28. Which file format does **not** support layers?
options:
Photoshop EPS
 Photoshop PDF
 Large Document Format
 Photoshop PSD

query: Q29. Of these formats, which supports 16-bit images?
options:
JPEG
 GIF
 PNG
 Photoshop EPS

query: Q30. What does the small black triangle in the lower-right corner of a tool indicate?
options:
that the tool is currently deselected
 tool options
 that the tool is currently selected
 grouped or hidden tools

query: Q31. Which command makes it easier to adjust selected areas of color in two images in order to make them similar?
options:
Match Color
 Replace Color
 Hue/Saturation
 Levels

query: Q32. If you scan a film or slide negative, which command turns it into a positive?
options:
Reverse
 Threshold
 Invert
 Inverse

query: Q33. A filter recipe can be saved as an action and set to your desktop for drag-and-drop usage by converting the filter recipe into a `___`.
options:
droplet
 batch
 scriptlet
 image process

query: Q34. Which tool is not found in the Select and Mask taskspace?
options:
Refine Edge
 Quick Select
 Magic Wand
 Lasso

query: Q35. To use blending modes with a filter, choose the `___` command.
options:
Mix
 Fade
 Smooth
 Blend

query: Q36. Which image adjustment is optimized for 32-bit images?
options:
Exposure
 Color Lookup
 Brightness/Contrast
 Curves

query: Q38. To save a panel layout arrangement, what should you create?
options:
A tool set
 A layer set
 A keyboard shortcut
 A workspace

query: Q39. Which filter should you use to create photorealistic blurs?
options:
Gaussian Blur
 Lens Blur
 Shape Blur
 Surface Blur

query: Q40. When using the Type tool, what do you call the space between lines?
options:
Vertical scale
 Kerning
 Leading
 Tracking

query: Q41. If you want the most control over color when inkjet printing, which option should you select?
options:
Color Handling: Photoshop Manages Colors
 Separations
 Color Handling: Printer Manages Colors
 Hard Proofing

query: Q42. You have an RGB image that you want to convert to a duotone, but in the image > Mode menu, the Duotone option in grayed out. Why is this happening?
options:
You must add a spot color channel first
 You must remove all existing color by Image > Adjustments > Desaturate first
 Duotones require a single channel, so you must convert to grayscale first
 Duotones require two channels, so you must delete one of RGB channels in the Channels panel first

query: Q43. For smoother, curved edges on a selection, be sure to enable the `___` option.
options:
anti-alias
 fade
 blend
 curve

query: Q44. Which web-ready format supports transparency and is optimized for continuous tone images such as photos?
options:
GIF
 PNG-8
 PNG-24
 JPEG

query: Q46. Which color space is best for web graphics?
options:
Adobe RGB
 ProPhoto RGB
 RGB
 sRGB

query: Q53. Where do you find natural media brushes?
options:
Photoshop does not have natural media brushes.
 In the **Brushes** panel, select a brush and then select **Convert to natural media**.
 In the **Brushes** panel, select **Legacy Brushes**.
 in the **Tool Presents** panel.

query: Q54. The option bar, which is normally above the canvas, is not visible. Where would you go to reopen it?
options:
View > Show > Show Extra Options
 Window > Tool Presets
 Window > Options
 Edit > Toolbar

query: Q55. What would you use to create a vector path for the purpose of altering a letter or shape?
options:
Pencil tool
 Vanishing Point
 Pen tool
 Trace Contour filter

query: Q56. How do you browse images on your hard drive using the companion application that is included with the Adobe Creative Cloud plans?
options:
Click `File > Browse in Bridge`
 Click `File > Browse in Lightroom Classic CC.`
 Use the Creative Cloud application.
 Click `File > Browse in Lightroom CC`.

query: Q57. Which command allows you to combine multiple channels into a new selection channel?
options:
Flatten
 Calculations
 Multiply
 Merge

[Answer found at:](https://helpx.adobe.com/photoshop/using/channel-calculations.html)
